title: Reset css
content: * { -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; } .btn:focus, .btn:active:focus, .btn.active:focus { outline: none; outline: none; outline-offset: 0; box-shadow: none; } input:focus, textarea:focus, select:focus { outline: none; } a:focus, a:hover, a:active { outline: none !important; }

title: Full width
content: #banner-img-calendar img { width: 100vw; position: relative; margin-left: -50vw; left: 50%; max-width: none; }
